external_games.name: Myth of Empires - Musical Instruments Pack

name: Myth of Empires: Musical Instruments Pack
summary: This musical instruments pack includes 10 traditional instruments, including the dizi, guqin, se, pan flute, pipa, sheng, suona, xun, konghou, and chime bells. Players can play these as they wish, or even upload custom MIDI tracks to play.
